name: Challenger Deep (the_Jorki)
description:
Challenger Deep is a 2D sidescroller game in which you slip into the role of Blue, who finds herself in a mysterious underwater world. On her journey through this ghostly world, Blue has to face dangerous creatures, solve puzzles and master powerful skills.

Will Blue find a way out of this place or will she be consumed by the darkness?

A controller is required to play the demo.

We made this demo as a bachelor project and we plan to finish it.

developpement team:

Jan "the_Jorki" Feyer

Chantal "Niesch" Steiger
